YOURSELF: In the halls of technology, surrounded by blinking circuits and humming machines, I felt the urge for something new, something that would really ignite my creativity and passion. So I decided to leave the rigid confines of electronics and embrace the exciting world of front-end development.
ME1: Through an intensive bootcamp for software development, recommended by an experienced programmer, I discovered my ability to not only write code, but also to design captivating user interfaces that appeal to emotions and inspire users.
ME2: My journey has taught me that the biggest breakthroughs often come from the boldest decisions. Now I am ready to bring my skills, my passion and my vision to your company - ready to push the boundaries of what is possible and shape the future of the digital age together.
SKILLCONTENT: I have grown my frontend developments skills that have allowed me to create different real projects.
PORTFOLIOHEADLINE: This page is a sample of my work - please feel free to try them out.
JOININTRO: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
SHARKIEINTRO: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help sharkie to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer whale.
POKEDEXINTRO: Based on the Pok√©API a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.
CONTACTCONTENT: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
